column1: Relatives and friends may visit the LOMBARDO FUNERAL HOME (Southtowns Chapel)
column2: 3060 Abbott Rd. near Lake Ave. on Monday from 2-8 PM where prayers will be held on Tuesday morning at 8:15 o'clock and a Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated at Our Lady of Victory Basilica at 9:15 o'clock. Interment Holy Cross Cemetery.
